featured.title: ZENFIT
featured.description: Health and Fitness Management App built with Java, XML, Firebase, SQLite, API
featured.details: Built a fitness app with an integrated pedometer, smart notifications and Firebase authentication. Achieved 30% faster response time using optimized API calls.

projects.title: ZENSTORE
projects.description: Compare, Save, and Shop from Local Vendors App
projects.details: Built a React Native and Spring Boot app that compares product prices and recommends the cheapest option. Integrated a feature enabling local vendors to list and promote products, enhancing availability and user choice.

projects.title: Flight Booking System
projects.details: Delivered smooth user experience with optimized back-end for performance, low resource usage, and efficient admin controls management to upload, manipulate and delete the data easily for all the users.
